title: Maxims of state written by Sir Walter Raleigh ; whereunto is added his Instructions to his sonne, and The son's advice to his aged father.
author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
publisher: Printed by W. Bentley, and are to be sold by W. Shears ...,
notes: First published in 1642 as: The prince, or, Maxims of state.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: filmed copy lacks all after "Maxims".
